name: Corn Paletas
description: This recipe for corn paletas takes all the sweet goodness of corn and transforms it into a an icy treat, and they are super easy to make.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup Sugar, granulated (or other vegan sweetener)

recipeInstructions.text: Place corn, almond milk, and sugar in a large pot. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Once it simmers, turn the heat off and take off the stove.
recipeInstructions.name: Place corn, almond milk, and sugar in a large pot. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Once it simmers, turn the heat off and take off the stove.

recipeInstructions.text: Place mixture in the blender, add vanilla, and process until smooth. (You can leave chunky if that is your preference.)
recipeInstructions.name: Place mixture in the blender, add vanilla, and process until smooth. (You can leave chunky if that is your preference.)

recipeInstructions.text: Straining the mixture is completely optional.
recipeInstructions.name: Straining the mixture is completely optional.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into popsicle molds and freeze for 5 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into popsicle molds and freeze for 5 hours.

keywords: corn paletas, homemade paletas, sweet corn popsicles
